topic.title: Copy a pinboard or visualization link

section.title: Copy a pinboard or visualization link
section.p: You can copy and paste the copied link to include in a presentation or spreadsheet, or email or Slack it to other people in your company. Note that when clicking the link, the person must be authenticated to ThoughtSpot to see the visualization (e.g. by signing in, or through LDAP).

You can also use this link for embedding the chart or table in another Web page, Web portal, or application when using the ThoughtSpot JavaScript API with Embedding or the REST API. For details, read the ThoughtSpot Application Integration Guide.

section.title: Copying a pinboard link
section.p: To copy the link for a pinboard:

li.p: Click Pinboards, on the top navigation bar.
On the pinboard list page, click the pinboard you would like to get a link for.
Copy the pinboard link. The highlighted portion is the pinboard ID.

To copy an individual visualization link, click the ellipses icon ![more options menu icon]({{ site.baseurl }}/images/icon-ellipses.png){: .inline} and select Copy link of the visualization you would like to copy a link from.
Copy the visualization link. The highlighted portion is the visualization ID.
